name: SYSTEMS AND SERVICE PROS, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Governor's Office of Administration and Department of General Services

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY and MONTEMURO, JJ.
parties: SYSTEMS AND SERVICE PROS, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Governor’s Office of Administration and Department of General Services.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed.
LARSEN, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Henry I. Langsam, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Jose E. Morales, Harrisburg, for DGS.

casebody.head_matter:
625 A.2d 615
SYSTEMS AND SERVICE PROS, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Governor’s Office of Administration and Department of General Services.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued May 4, 1993.
Decided May 24, 1993.
Henry I. Langsam, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Jose E. Morales, Harrisburg, for DGS.
Nathan C. Pringle, Jr., Frank A. Fisher, Jr., Harrisburg, for Office of Adm.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY and MONTEMURO, JJ.
